name: Drifters Don't Break
description:
Drifters Don't Break is a game made for the #gmtkjam 2020.

The theme of the jam was "Out of Control" and I decided to apply it by creating a car game where players can not control the car's acceleration or break.

On this game, the player has to use his/her drifting skills to reach the end of each of the stages.

Counting with 12 levels in total (currently), the game gets pretty hard at some point (but not impossible). Only the most persistent and skilled players  can beat the 12 challenges. Are you one of them?
